column1: In this master’s in applied statistics, you’ll learn statistical analysis and apply it to a variety of industries, including insurance, marketing, government, health care, and more.95% Outcome Rate of RIT Graduates from this degree $98K Average First-Year Salary of RIT Graduates from this degree34% Employment growth rate Expected for statisticians by 2026, four times faster than the overall labor market30% Merit scholarship Average award given to accepted students
Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
